baseAttack.name: POWERGLOVE_BASE
baseAttack.description: Choose 1 target on any square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that squareand give the target 1 damage and 2 marks.

alternativeAttack.name: POWERGLOVE_OP1
alternativeAttack.description: Choose a square exactly 1 move away. Move onto that square. You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there. If you want, you may move 1 more square in that same direction (but only if it is a legal move). You may deal 2 damage to 1 target there, as well.
